CMD_ARG_TEXTURE_DESC: Directory containing texture images (by default, looks for a directory with the same name as the OBJ file)
LOAD_OBJ_SUCCESS: Successfully parsed OBJ file: {filename}, containing {vertex_count} vertices, {texcoord_count} texture coordinates, {face_count} triangles
CANNOT_LOAD_MTL: Warning: Cannot load or parse MTL file: {filename}
VERTEX_INDEX_OUT_OF_RANGE: Error: Vertex index out of range: {index}
TEXCOORD_INDEX_OUT_OF_RANGE: Warning: Texture coordinate index out of range: {index}
PROCESS_MATERIAL: Processing material "{note}": original colors {orig} -> quantized to {quant}.
PALETTE_INDEX_OUT_OF_RANGE: Error: Palette index out of range!
SAMPLE_POOL_EMPTY: Warning: Sample pool is empty, cannot generate palette.
CANNOT_ALLOC_MODEL: Error: Cannot allocate memory for model structure
CANNOT_ALLOC_VOXEL: Error: Cannot allocate memory for voxel data
NO_VALID_SUBMODEL: Failed to create VOX model: no valid submodels generated
NO_PHYS_TAG: [Sampling] Warning: No physical tag found for material: {material}
CMD_MUST_INPUT: -i must be used to specify the input file
PY_WF_WELDING_COMPLETE: Vertex welding complete, {count} unique vertices remain.
PY_WF_STEP2: Step 2: Calculating transforms for all surfaces...
PY_WF_STEP3: Step 3: Processing each surface in a loop...
PY_TOOL_XML_NO_GROUP: Root tag of {path} is not '<group>'. Transform not updated.
PY_BACKUP_EXISTING: Backed up existing "{target}" to a temporary location.
PY_COMMIT_ERROR: Error during commit. Rolling back changes...
PY_ROLLBACK_ERROR: Critical error during rollback: {e}. Manual cleanup of "{target_dir}" and "{backup_dir}" may be required.
PY_WF_CLEANUP_INTERMEDIATE: Cleaning up intermediate surface XML files...
PREF_RESET_CONFIRM_MSG: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default? This action cannot be undone. The application will close afterwards.
PREF_RESET_COMPLETE_MSG: All settings have been reset. The application will now close.
PREF_GENERAL_TEMP_DIR_PLACEHOLDER: Leave blank to use system default temp directory
PREF_MAT_DEFAULT_BEHAVIOR: Default material for unassigned items in manual mode:
PREF_ADVANCED_ANGLE_TOL_TOOLTIP: Maximum normal vector angle for determining if two faces are coplanar. Smaller values mean stricter grouping, suitable for smooth surfaces with many small angle differences.
PREF_ADVANCED_DIST_TOL_TOOLTIP: Maximum distance for determining if a vertex lies on a plane. Smaller values mean stricter grouping.
PREF_ADVANCED_ANGLE_TOL_TOOLTIP_SIMPLE:
Controls how the program recognizes 'planes'.

If surfaces that should be flat are incorrectly split into many small pieces, try increasing this value to help merge them into a complete face.
PREF_ADVANCED_DIST_TOL_TOOLTIP_SIMPLE:
Works together with 'angle tolerance'.

If increasing angle tolerance does not merge flat surfaces correctly, try increasing this value. It allows the program to tolerate larger model imperfections.
GUI_SELECT_OR_DROP_OBJ_PLACEHOLDER: Click 'Browse...' or drag a .obj file here
GUI_DROP_TIP: (or drag the file directly into the input box above)
GUI_PRECHECK_OBJ_NOT_FOUND: Error: OBJ file not found or not a valid OBJ file
GUI_PRECHECK_NO_MTL_REF: Note: Model does not reference any material library (.mtl) file.
GUI_PRECHECK_MTL_NOT_FOUND: Warning: Referenced material library not found: {filename}
GUI_PRECHECK_MTL_FOUND_NO_TEX: Success: Found material library {filename} (no textures referenced).
GUI_PRECHECK_ALL_FOUND: Success: All dependencies (MTL and textures) found!
GUI_PRECHECK_OBJ_NAME_NON_ASCII: Caution: OBJ file name contains non-ASCII characters.
GUI_SELECT_POLYVOX_PLACEHOLDER: Please specify the location of polyvox.exe
GUI_SELECT_OUTDIR_PLACEHOLDER: Please select a folder to store the results
GUI_INPUT_ERROR: All paths must be filled in!
GUI_CONFIRM_MANUAL_POLYVOX_MSG:
The application usually auto-detects the location of the Polyvox core executable.

Are you sure you want to specify the path manually?
GUI_OBJ_MTL_REF_ERROR: Error reading OBJ file for mtllib: {e}
MAT_MAP_UPDATED_LOG: Custom material mapping updated: TD material for {mat_name} is {td_note}, VOX render type is {vox_type}
MAT_MAP_CLEAR_SELECTED_CONFIRM_MSG: Are you sure you want to reset the selected {count} material mappings to default?
MAT_MAP_NO_PROPS: This render material has no adjustable properties.
MAT_MAP_LOAD_PRESET_NO_PRESET: "Auto" or "None" types have no available presets.
MAT_MAP_SORT_TYPE_ASC: Sort by type ascending, name ascending
MAT_MAP_SORT_TYPE_DESC: Sort by type descending, name descending
